attributes.action: Stop right now all efforts to get US missiles on UK soil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: News reports show the PM to be courting the US with a view to the UK becoming a platform for an anti-ballistic missile system. This would be ineffective against any terrorist threat, and increase the risk of such threats. On past performance, there's no evidence that the US would invoke any such system to defend Europe, either.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
